events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
Customer support agent Emily has been assigned to address the refund request.
Hello! Iâ€™m Emily and I will assist you with your refund request for the wrong item received.
Could you please provide your order number and any photos of the item you received for verification?
Sure, my order number is 789654123. I have attached photos showing the incorrect product that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will start your refund process immediately and you should see the money back in your account within 5 business days.
Thanks, I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving my refund soon.
The refund has been processed on our end and the case is now considered resolved. Please contact us if you have any further issues.
We are checking in to confirm that your refund was received successfully and that you are satisfied with the solution provided.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
